# ibkr-porez

Automated PPDG-3R tax reports for Interactive Brokers. It automatically pulls your data and generates a ready-to-upload XML file with all prices converted to RSD.


### Advanced

Use
```bash
ibkr-porez --help
```
to see all available options.
